thread.title: U.S. and Turkey agree to mend ties

title: U.S. and Turkey agree to mend ties
text:
U.S. and Turkey agree to mend ties 3:26pm GMT - 02:14 
The United States and Turkey agreed on Friday to try to rescue a strategic relationship that Washington acknowledged had reached a crisis point, with Turkey proposing a joint deployment in Syria if a U.S.-backed Kurdish militia leaves a border area. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
